items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: Absolutely stunning dress. Usually wears an extra small, but the small was perfect. Read more
items.author: S L

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress
items.body: Would've given this 5 stars. Fits like a glove, color is amazing! Only thing is that it was extremely long I'm 5'3 and am dragging it when walking. And to pay to get it hemd. Read more
items.author: Marisa coronel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ADORABLE!
items.body: ABSOLUTELY LOVEEE!!! It's such an amazing dress, the fit is perfect, gives the snatched look! Perfect crisp white color, the material was super comfy and i just loveeee. Read more
items.author: Silverado

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Long
items.body: This dress is beautifully made and is great for any occasion. The fabric is a lightweight breathable material that is great for summer. The size fit perfectly around my curves however the dress was longer than expected but is an easy fix with cute heels! The material is soft and flowing and the dress is so versatile. Pair with a sweater for chilly nights and the pretty white color makes it fun to accessorize! Read more
items.author: Katarina Garza

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars NOT true to size
items.body: It’s a cute dress. Ordered in XS. Length spot on at 5’2” for floor length. Nice fabric. Light weight and great. However, unable to zip the side. The size seems inaccurate, even though it fits in all other areas, chest/rib cage. The dress is otherwise very wearable, but it’s not exactly stretchy enough to make up for the zipper issue. It appears to me to be a lot of variation in the manufacturing of these to make proper fit a hit and miss! Read more
items.author: ccp

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful maxie dress!!
items.body: I found this Yulaviniee strapless maxi dress, the picture looked so pretty I had to get it. It’s prettier in person. It’s a great fit and the material is very stretchy and breathable, I love it. The dress is made with great quality material and it’s so light. I’m so happy I found this dress in time for a party I have to go to this weekend!! Read more
items.author: Yvette Garcia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for!
items.body: Wow! I bought this dress for my engagement party because it looks like a very expensive one I saw at a designer store. I was shocked at the quality of this dress. I'm not sure I'd know the difference between this and the other dress. It's just perfect and exactly what I was looking for. It's near floor length but still allows space to see my shoes. It is so form fitting it pulls my waist in and then poofs out at the hips. It's so flattering! I will pair it with a gold necklace and gold earrings and white/gold heels. This is perfect for my engagement party, and also great for casual or dressy wear. I'm thrilled with this purchase and all the money I saved by buying this vs the other more expensive designer dress. It's comfortable and high quality material. Very impressed! Read more
items.author: Krista

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars White, strapless dress with hidden side zipper
items.body: This dress is very cute. It's the kind of thing that can quickly become a wardrobe staple. Whether you're wearing it alone, with a shawl, sweater, etc it's very versatile. The ruching is cute and makes the dress more interesting than just a flat fronted sleeveless shift. The side zipper is well placed and virtually disappears once zipped. The fabric is crisp and cool, not at all see through (the dress is lined), and has a slight amount of stretch that allows it to conform to your torso. It stays up nicely and is very comfortable to wear. Read more
items.author: Kennedi

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red 1, Rose Red, Brown, Pure Black, Pink, White, Burgundy, Royal Blue, Black, Sage, Navy Blue, White 1. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
